= Server =

  * u need change servercommon.sh,to set listenPort,maxThreads & responseSize;
  * then u just need to execute minarpc.sh | nettyrpc.sh | minasimple.sh |  nettysimple.sh;

= Client =

  * u need change clientcommon.sh,to set [serverip] [serverport] [concurrents] [timeout] [datatype] [requestsize] [runtime] [clientnums];
  * then u just need to execute minarpc.sh | nettyrpc.sh | minasimple.sh |  nettysimple.sh;
  * when benchmark finished,it'll print results to logs(minarpc.sh --> benchmark.log.mina.rpc etc.),just like belows:
